name: dxie
short_description: DXIE is a Dynamic XML Instance Editor that provides dynamic GUI editing of XML documents. DXIE reads a Document (XML) and its Schema (XSD) and produces a dynamic UI for editing (search, add, edit, and delete) of the Document.
